headlines.headline: Giannis: 'As of today, I'm committed to the Milwaukee Bucks'
headlines.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo sits down with Malika Andrews and discusses his future with the Milwaukee Bucks.

headlines.headline: Adam Silver 'paying attention' to tanking teams
headlines.description: NBA commissioner Adam Silver addresses the tanking issue in the NBA.

headlines.headline: Lillard claims 3rd shootout title; Johnson wins dunk contest
headlines.description: Damian Lillard, nine months after undergoing surgery on his torn Achilles, won his third All-Star 3-point contest to tie with Larry Bird and Craig Hodges for the most ever.

headlines.headline: Wembanyama vows to bring competitiveness to All-Star Game
headlines.description: Spurs big man Victor Wembanyama vowed to bring a competitive spirit to Sunday's NBA All-Star Game.

headlines.headline: Sources: Raiders promoting assistant Rob Leonard to DC
headlines.description: The Raiders are promoting run game coordinator/defensive line coach Rob Leonard to defensive coordinator, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

headlines.headline: What's next for the Seahawks? Why a critical offseason awaits
headlines.description: Seattle has to make decisions on a new OC and whether to re-sign Super Bowl MVP Kenneth Walker III.

headlines.headline: Is Trevor Lawrence's 2025 success sustainable?
headlines.description: Trevor Lawrence's final eight games propelled him to being named an MVP finalist in 2025. Can he continue it next season?

headlines.headline: Zachary Orr joining Seattle as ILBs coach, sources say
headlines.description: The Seahawks are hiring former Ravens defensive coordinator Zachary Orr as their inside linebackers coach, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter and Jeremy Fowler on Friday.

headlines.headline: U.S. men win, keep pace with Canada for top seed at Olympics
headlines.description: The U.S. men's Olympic hockey team rode its top line to a 6-3 win over Denmark and remain tied with also-unbeaten Canada going into the final day of the preliminary round.

headlines.headline: Grades, questions from Team USA's Olympic hockey win vs. Denmark
headlines.description: It was closer than many predicted, but a win is a win. Here's how it went down, and what comes next.
